data.name: PROJECT WRAITH
data.detailed_description:
PROJECT WRAITH will always be a fun, clean, traditional FPS game. This will never change. No silly killstreaks, overpowered vehicles or annoying in-game mechanics. We are a pure infantry combat FPS with authentic design.

Please remember to wishlist and follow, it'll really help us - especially since we're a tiny indie team.

Transparency is our biggest strength. Constant updates via our social media channels will ensure you're always in the know. We're very active on our Discord, come join us!

  • Large variety of exotic weapons and attachments to choose from.
  • Regular patches and updates with content and support.
  • Strong Community focus. Our active presence shows our dedication to making a long-lasting game, not yearly abandonware.
  • Beautiful maps and good level design, no unnecessary chokepoints.
  • Realistic damage model. Drop people quickly, headshots are rewarded.
  • Solid netcode running at up to 90 tickrate.
  • Immersive, easy to pinpoint sound design. Footsteps are loud and clear.
  • Good variety of game modes and ability to host Custom Servers.
  • Zero pay-to-win or aggressive, anti-player monetisation.

There is an endless amount of times that we can shamelessly self plug, much to your annoyance. Seriously, how many times are we going to ask you to join our darn Discord server?

data.short_description: Made with one goal in mind - beautiful, fun gameplay. We're getting rid of as many frustrating elements of modern FPS games. Focused purely on infantry combat, expect constant action. Zero anti-consumer nonsense. Remember the golden era? Welcome back to the roots of what made gaming fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 9th gen or Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 @ 60 FPS, Low Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or above
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 @ 60 FPS, Medium-High Settings

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

data.legal_notice: PROJECT WRAITH and its associated content is managed and owned by Grassrootz Studio, based in the United Kingdom.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent and heavy blood, gore and violence.
